cards.name: Wound Pain
cards.description: All enemy lose all their Bleeding and Poison. They receive damage equals to Bleeding stacks times Poison stacks. Exhaust.

cards.name: Wound Pain+

cards.name: Anger

cards.description: Give all enemies 3 Poison, 3 Bleeding, 2 Weakened and 2 Vulnerable. Exhaust.

cards.name: Bloody Fumes+
cards.description: Give all enemies 5 Poison, 5 Bleeding, 3 Weakened and 3 Vulnerable. Exhaust.

cards.name: Charge
cards.description: Discard all status cards in your hand. Take 6 damage, gain 2 energy, draw 4 cards. Put a Wound into your draw pile. Exhaust.

cards.name: Charge+
cards.description: Discard all status cards in your hand. Take 6 damage, gain 3 energy, draw 6 cards. Put a Wound into your draw pile. Exhaust.

cards.description: When combo finish, gain 1 energy and draw 1 extra card.

cards.name: Combo Form+
cards.description: When combo finish, gain 1 energy and draw 1 extra card.

cards.name: Double Combo
cards.description: Repeat your next combo with 50% faster speed, but can only deal damage and deal 25% less.

cards.name: Double Combo+
cards.description: Repeat your next combo with 50% faster speed, but can only deal damage and deal 25% less.

cards.name: Faster
cards.description: Every turn, you're 33 % faster per card played.

cards.name: Preparing Shield+

cards.name: Stronger
cards.description: Combo deal extra 20 % damage per card.

cards.name: Stronger+
cards.description: Combo deal extra 25 % damage per card.

cards.name: Throw Away
cards.description: Discard up to 3 cards, add a Dazed to your draw pile for each. If you discarded at least 3, gain 1 energy and draw 1 card. If you discarded at least 3 status cards, gain 1 Dexterity.

cards.name: Throw Away+
cards.description: Discard up to 5 cards, add a Dazed to your draw pile for each. If you discarded at least 3, gain 1 energy and draw 1 card. If you discarded at least 3 status cards, gain 1 Dexterity.

cards.name: Ultimate Armor
cards.description: Gain X Metallicize and 2 * X Plated Armor. You cannot attack this turn.

cards.name: Ultimate Armor+
cards.description: Gain X Metallicize and 3 * X Plated Armor. You cannot attack this turn.

cards.description: Choose: Disarm, Blow, or Hammer. In this combo, you're 20 % faster per card played.

cards.name: Ultralight Hammer+

cards.description: Choose: Thrust, Slash, or Strike.

cards.name: Wave Blade Sword+
cards.description: Choose: Thrust, Slash, or Strike.

keywords.name: Bleeding
keywords.description: Deal (stack amount / 2) damage every turn, enemy receive 1% more attack damage and poison damage for each stack.

keywords.name: Combo
keywords.description: Each attack type can combo with specific attack types. When combo, card cost 1 less and deal 25% more damage; when combo finish, give dazed based on combo speed.

keywords.name: Dazed
keywords.description: Dazed creature deal 1% less damage per stack. Reduces by half per turn. Stacks based on percentage instead of amount.

keywords.name: Distracted
keywords.description: Distracted creature deal 1% less and receive 1% more damage per stack this turn.

keywords.name: Fatigue
keywords.description: Fatigue is an unplayable status card. At the end of the turn, doesn't discard and makes you draw 1 less card next turn.

keywords.name: Grasped
keywords.description: Grasped creature lose 1 strength per stack this turn. Wear off when you play a card.

keywords.name: Speed
keywords.description: Combo give dazed amount = square root of (card played * 5000 / total speed amount).
